title: Ep. 3: The Shed Horn Buck of 1962
itunes:title: Ep. 3: The Shed Horn Buck of 1962
description:
James Lawrence is a master public land whitetail hunter and his favorite tactic is called "still hunting." In this episode of Bear Grease, you'll hear James' family story and about the buck that altered the trajectory of his life. The story has many twists, turns, and some family drama. For many years, James has been an influential figure in Clay Newcomb's life and he explores why relationships are so valuable. You'll be entertained by a great story, learn some techniques for hunting, and you'll be challenged to build stronger relationships.


Connect with Clay and MeatEater
